channel.title: Official Release! RSC - ActionPK
channel.description:
[img]http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y37/fleximation/lolol-1.jpg[/img]
[b]DOWNLOAD┐┐┐┐┐┐┐┐┐┐[/b]
[b]Client -[/b] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=YDEWX9Q9]CLICK HERE[/url] (MegaUpload) [b]Client -[/b] [url=http://www.speedyshare.com/files/19507321/New_ActionPK_Client.rar]CLICK HERE[/url] (SpeedyShare)
[b]Forum -[/b] *
[b]Video -[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CvwMu4BQPDE]CLICK HERE[/url]
[i][b]Features : [/b] [/i]
[i][u]Exp Rates[/u] [/i] : x30
[i][u]Masterfisher[/u][/i] Implanted, Free Sharks.
[i][u]Training Area[/u][/i] : 11 Differents kind on Npcs (Level 3-85)
[img]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/3732/training1v.jpg[/img] [img]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/1851/training2.jpg[/img]
[i][u]Custom Map[/u][/i] : Useless parts removed
[i][u]Shopkeeper[/u][/i] :
[img]http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y37/fleximation/armour.jpg[/img] [img]http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y37/fleximation/arropw.jpg[/img] [img]http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y37/fleximation/mage.jpg[/img]
[b]Pking Area: [/b]
[i]-Low level pking area over Edgeville
-Mid-Level pking at Castle
-High level pking at DMaze, Altar, Mage Arena.[/i]
-[b]1v1 area for Event[/b] :
[img]http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y37/fleximation/1v1.png[/img]
[i]We're still working everyday on the server. Any suggestions will be taken in order to please all our future players![/i]

item.title: Official Release! RSC - ActionPK
item.dc:creator: @GoodGodz GoodGodz
item.description:
@GoodGodz wrote:

Great server, It is a p2p based pking server, Exp rates are not to fast not to slow. Money and items same as exp not to easy and not to hard to obtain. Unlike its competition this server is dedicated to pking not skilling, so there will always be people in the wild training/pking.

It offers the same pking as the other servers around but having to put less time to obtain flats and less time to get money for items to go out and pk with. Friendly people play this server everyone is nice and into giving new players a helping hand.

The staff is great at what they do… Coding and such, And they are willing to take suggestion to help improve the server. So don’t be afraid to speak up with suggestions or fixes, they are fast about fixing any issues on the server. As I have found a few and they were fixed right away.

I love this server even though its new its not as bad as most new servers. So please people give it a try, cant hurt to try. If you enjoy pking and not spending all your time getting money, stats and items this is the server for you.
Btw my name in game is Tim Nova and if you need help or some items to get you started feel free to pm me and ill get you on your way to pking glory!

-Tim Nova

Read full topic

item.title: Official Release! RSC - ActionPK
item.dc:creator: @ActionPK ActionPK
item.description:
@ActionPK wrote:

divineapple:

i’ve try this server. 1 word to describe it. Failure. first of all you buy a mith2h from shop at 3.2k sell it at 160gp. Secondly you cant smith and thr’s only a few places to go,others block.the worst is unable to sell items that not sold in shop.

1- No smithing because It’s A PK Server.
2- Shopkeeper will be fixed (The selling price will be set, and you’ll be able to sell your stuffs.)

It’s a new server, We need feedbacks to make improvements, I usually fix the problem within a day.

Read full topic
